tool_description:
Send your SMS now !
Available only for France, but soon other countries on our destination list.
Take a look !
name: sms-exchange
title: sms-exchange

api_list.name: send-sms
api_list.description: simply send you sms in france with our API !
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sms-exchange.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sms-exchange.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://sms-exchange.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sms-exchange.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
